snippet: A Rhode Island judge ordered documents to be released in a lawsuit over a widow’s $60 million gift to the Legion of Christ, whose founder molested seminarians and fathered children.
abstract: Rhode Island judge orders documents to be released in lawsuit over Gabrielle D Mee's $60 million gift to powerful Catholic order known as Legion of Christ; papers, which include depositions filed by her niece Mary Lou Dauray in 2009, shed light on how founder Rev Marcial Maciel Degollado had molested under-age seminarians and fathered several children.
lead_paragraph: A Rhode Island judge ordered documents to be released in a lawsuit over a widow’s $60 million gift to the Legion of Christ, whose founder molested seminarians and fathered children.

headline.seo: Documents on Bequest to Legion of Christ Are Released
headline.main: New Scrutiny for a Bequest to an Order of Catholics
headline.print_headline: New Scrutiny For a Bequest To an Order Of Catholics
